hotels.name: Coral Reef Club
hotels.desc: Luxury beachfront resort, private beach, world-class amenities, tropical gardens
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive beachfront sanctuary offering pristine white sand, crystal-clear waters, and elegant accommodations perfect for families seeking a memorable Caribbean escape.
hotels.address: Porters Folkstone St. James, Folkestone, Saint James BB24017Barbados

hotels.name: Hilton Barbados Resort
hotels.desc: Oceanfront resort, kids club, multiple pools, water sports, family suites
hotels.longDesc: Perfectly positioned on Carlisle Bay with direct beach access, this resort combines comfort with family-friendly activities and entertainment options for all ages.
hotels.address: Needham's Point, Bridgetown, Saint Michael BB11000Barbados

hotels.name: Cobblers Cove Hotel
hotels.desc: Boutique beachfront hotel, charming colonial style, intimate setting, gourmet dining
hotels.longDesc: A charming boutique retreat nestled in Speightstown's north coast, offering personalized service and authentic Caribbean charm ideal for families preferring quieter, upscale surroundings.
hotels.address: Road View, Speightstown, Saint Peter BB26025Barbados

hotels.name: Turtle Beach by Elegant Hotels - All-Inclusive
hotels.desc: All-inclusive family resort, water sports, kids programs, direct beach access
hotels.longDesc: A relaxed all-inclusive resort on the south coast featuring direct beach access, engaging kids' activities, and easy access to local attractions for carefree family vacations.
hotels.photoAttribution: Turtle Beach by Elegant Hotels - All-Inclusive

restaurants.name: Oistins Fish Market
restaurants.desc: Street food market, fresh grilled fish, local cuisine, vibrant atmosphere, Friday night scene
restaurants.longDesc: A legendary waterfront gathering where families enjoy freshly grilled fish and Caribbean classics while soaking in authentic island culture and lively evening entertainment.

restaurants.name: Lone Star Restaurant & Hotel
restaurants.desc: Beachfront fine dining, Caribbean seafood, sunset views, elegant ambiance
restaurants.longDesc: An upscale beachfront restaurant serving exquisite Caribbean cuisine with stunning ocean views, perfect for special family dinners and celebrating memorable moments.
restaurants.address: Hwy 1B, Mount Standfast, Saint James BB24053Barbados

restaurants.name: Café Luna Barbados
restaurants.desc: Casual Italian cafe, fresh pasta, coffee, relaxed vibe, family-friendly
restaurants.longDesc: A charming Italian-inspired cafe offering delicious homemade pasta, excellent coffee, and a welcoming atmosphere where families can enjoy leisurely meals together.
restaurants.address: Enterprise Beach Rd, Oistins, Christ Church Barbados

restaurants.name: Fish Pot
restaurants.desc: Beachfront seafood, fresh catch daily, sunset dining, intimate setting
restaurants.longDesc: A picturesque seaside restaurant specializing in fresh seafood dishes, offering families an intimate dining experience with beautiful ocean views and authentic local flavors.
restaurants.address: Little Good Harbour Hotel Shermans St.Lucy St. Lucy, Clinketts, Saint Peter BB27190Barbados

restaurants.name: The Tides Barbados
restaurants.desc: Bajan cuisine in a restored coral stone house with garden views
restaurants.address: Balmore House, Holetown, Saint James Barbados

restaurants.name: Round House
restaurants.desc: Historic coastal restaurant overlooking Bathsheba with fresh seafood and spectacular views
restaurants.address: Highway Z Bathsheba BB BB21054, Bathsheba, Saint Joseph Barbados

restaurants.name: Cuz's Fish Stand
restaurants.desc: Casual beachside fish shack with flying fish sandwiches and rum punch
restaurants.address: Pebbles beach, Bridgetown, Saint Michael Barbados

restaurants.name: Fisherman's Pub
restaurants.desc: Casual waterfront pub with fish cakes and local fare in Speightstown
restaurants.address: Speightstown, Queens St, Speightstown, Saint Peter BB26013Barbados

restaurants.name: The Cliff
restaurants.desc: Upscale cliffside dining with Caribbean cuisine and ocean views in Derricks
restaurants.address: Derricks, St. James, Barbados Holetown St. James, Durants, Saint James BB24110Barbados

restaurants.name: Champers Restaurant Barbados
restaurants.desc: Cliffside seafood restaurant with sunset views in Rockley
restaurants.address: Skeetes Hill, Bridgetown, Christ Church Barbados

restaurants.name: The Atlantis Historic Inn
restaurants.desc: Historic hotel restaurant with traditional Bajan buffet and dramatic ocean views in Bathsheba

restaurants.name: Primo Bar & Bistro
restaurants.desc: Family-friendly Italian restaurant with pasta and pizza in St. Lawrence Gap
restaurants.address: St Lawrence Gap, Oistins, Christ Church Barbados

restaurants.name: Lobster Alive
restaurants.desc: Waterfront seafood restaurant in Bay Garden serving fresh lobster and local seafood with ocean views
restaurants.address: Bay St, Bridgetown, Saint Michael Barbados

restaurants.name: Coffee Culture Cafe & Eatery
restaurants.desc: Local coffee spot with fresh pastries and Caribbean roasts
restaurants.address: 138 Main St, Cambridge, ON N1R 1V7, Canada

restaurants.name: Nishi Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Casual beachfront sushi and Asian fusion near Holetown
restaurants.address: Second St, Holetown, Saint James Barbados

experiences.name: St. Nicholas Abbey
experiences.desc: Historic plantation house, museum, rum distillery, lush gardens, cultural landmark
experiences.longDesc: A storied plantation estate showcasing Barbados' colonial history, heritage artifacts, and traditional rum production. The grounds feature beautiful gardens and offer insight into the island's resilient past.
experiences.address: Cherry Tree Hill St. Peter, Saint Peter BB26007Barbados

experiences.name: Harrison's Cave Eco-Adventure Park
experiences.desc: Tropical rainforest, underground stream, cave system, tram tours, natural beauty
experiences.longDesc: Barbados's premier natural wonder featuring lush rainforest, cascading waterfall, and underground streams accessible by scenic tram rides that captivate visitors of all ages.
experiences.address: Allen View, Welchman Hall, Saint Thomas Barbados

experiences.name: Bathsheba
experiences.desc: Dramatic Atlantic coastline, rugged cliffs, powerful waves, scenic beauty, nature walks
experiences.longDesc: A spectacularly rugged and dramatic eastern coastline where families can witness powerful Atlantic waves against towering cliffs and enjoy scenic walks through pristine nature.

experiences.name: Garrison
experiences.desc: UNESCO World Heritage site, colonial architecture, historic buildings, cultural landmarks
experiences.longDesc: A beautifully preserved UNESCO heritage site showcasing centuries of colonial architecture and Barbados's rich history, offering educational and photogenic exploration for curious families.

experiences.name: The Soup Bowl
experiences.desc: World-class surf spot, adventure activities, scenic coastal views, adrenaline rush
experiences.longDesc: A renowned international surf destination offering thrilling waves and exciting water sports, where adventurous families can witness skilled surfers and experience coastal excitement.
experiences.address: The Soup Bowl, Bathsheba, Saint Joseph Barbados

experiences.name: Mullins Beach
experiences.desc: Popular public beach on the West Coast with calm waters, beach bars, and water sports

experiences.name: Accra Beach Hotel & Spa
experiences.desc: Popular family-friendly beach on the South Coast with lifeguards, calm waters, and facilities
experiences.address: Christ Church BB 15139, Barbados West Indies, Bridgetown, Christ Church Barbados

experiences.name: Dover Beach
experiences.desc: Lively South Coast beach popular with locals and tourists, great for swimming and beach activities

kidFriendly.name: Carlisle Bay
kidFriendly.desc: Family beach, calm waters, water sports, historic shipwrecks, snorkeling, safe swimming
kidFriendly.longDesc: A family-favorite protected bay with gentle waters perfect for young swimmers, combined with fascinating submerged shipwrecks and abundant marine life to explore together.

markets.name: Cheapside Markets
markets.desc: Historic produce market, fresh tropical fruits, local vegetables, artisan crafts, authentic Barbadian experience
markets.longDesc: A vibrant cultural hub where families discover fresh local produce, colorful tropical fruits, handmade crafts, and experience the authentic pulse of Barbadian daily life.

a.name: Barbados Family Beach Adventure (7 Days)
a.description: A perfectly paced week exploring Barbados' tranquil west coast and dramatic east coast, with rum distilleries, cave adventures, and endless beach time designed for young families.
